artist: Artist: Utagawa Yoshitora; Publisher: Yamadaya Shōjirō
description: three sheets make up image of buildings on either side of a winding river, with two bridges packed with people (center sheet); figures with geese, LRQ; from accordion-folded album with black soft cover
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Collection of Famous Places in the World (Bankoku meishō zukushi no uchi 萬国名勝尽競之内)
title: City Square of Nanjing of the Great Qing
